headline: Expedia Group (EXPE): Assessing Valuation Following Recent Share Price Surge
summary: Expedia Group (EXPE) shares moved higher today, with investors watching the company after it posted solid gains over the past month. Market participants continue to evaluate its performance and outlook in a competitive online travel landscape. See our latest analysis for Expedia Group. Expedia Group’s momentum has been hard to miss, with a 17.7% jump in its share price over the past month and a year-to-date share price return of nearly 40%. Looking at the bigger picture, the company’s total...
